Introduction: On a fine evening, you are lying beside your sister while she is reading a long boring book.
Suddenly, a white rabbit with long coat runs by you!
'Was that a rabbit wearing a coat!', you wonder.
Your cat Dinah also comes and runs by you going after the rabbit
You quickly go after the two to see what exactly is happening.
The rabbit goes into a rabbit hole and so does your cat, you quickly follow without thinking.
Instructions: To move in any direction, simply type it e.g. 'Go North', 'Go South', 'Go Northwest' e.t.c.
To see the map, type 'see map', 'show map' or simply 'map'
To collect an item, type 'collect gem', 'collect map', collect bottle' e.t.c.
You can also drop an item you have collected.
To check items you have, type 'show inventory', 'i' or 'show items'
To give an item, type 'give gem', 'give glove' e.t.c.
To see these instructions anywhere, type 'instructions'
Remember to have fun in Wonderland, Alice!
